column5: I'm in dunsford on sturgeon lake and we got the snow first then ice pellets then the good stuff came !!!! Everything is froze here with the freezing rain gonna e fun going down my step hill to make a hairpin at the stop sigh to get out to the highway. ..... Fun wow ....

Same stuff over this way Shaun, some light snow last evening and now it's been raining & freezing for a couple hours and everything has a coat of ice on it.  My daughter came up for the weekend and has to leave for Missisauga in 90 minutes, so I sure hope the salt trucks are out doing their thing.
Well hwy 36 was bad till hwy 7 in Lindsay and it was salted right to Sunderland !!!! I'm at work now. But the side roads are still all ice coated !!! Have a good day boys & girls drive safe !!!!
Rain rain rain here not any sign of white stuff here
From Minnesota to Maine , Timmins to Pennsylvania it's all the same this morning ......... salt, chains and foot ball shoes .
Nothing but rain and fog here in Niagara
Was'nt enough to fire up any of our equipment ........
